item.title: Access CVL@UWA
item.description: The cluster is accessible via https://desktop.cvl.org.au/strudel-web/#/system-selector (CVL@UWA dropdown) Join an existing project Login to https://hpc.erc.monash.edu.au/aafbootstrap with AAF credentials. Click on “Join existing project” and enter project ID. Create a new project Login to https://hpc.erc.monash.edu.au/aafbootstrap with AAF credentials. Fill in the New Project Form. More information can be found here.
